name: The A-Team Escape
description:
Load up this endless driving game where you take control of the A-Team van and try and escape from Col. Decker. 

Every second that goes by he's closing you down!

Collect smoke grenade power-ups and then deploy the smoke to slow Decker down and give you more time to keep escaping!

See what highscore you can get!

**Game still in development** Controls: 

WASD / Cursor Keys - for movement. Move in all 4 directs in order to avoid traffic. If you hit traffic that will slow you down and allow Decker to catch you quicker.

Spacebar - fire Smoke. Collect 3 smoke grenade power-ups then hit 'Spacebar' to trigger the smoke grenade. That will slow Decker down and give you chance to get further away.... but it's only temporary!
